title: Makayla distinguish instrument notes Noah cannot

content.prompt: Makayla and Noah are listening to a song that ends with all the instruments playing the same note. Makayla can distinguish the various instruments playing the note, while Noah cannot. Which of the following best explains their perceptual differences?

choices.label: Makayla has a lower absolute threshold for sound than Noah.
Makayla has a higher difference threshold for sound than Noah.
Makayla is better at discriminating amplitude than Noah.
Makayla is better at discriminating timbre than Noah.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
